title: AI-Enhanced Multisensory Technology Program for Professional English Literacy Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English reading/writing skills and fundamental job-related terminology
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, focusing on improving job-linked English literacy for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields.

learning_goals: Learners extract core information from specialized English texts (e.g., medical reports, technical manuals) with 80% accuracy using an AI-based platform.
By applying multisensory (auditory, visual, tactile) learning tools, learners interpret complex English sentence structures with 70% or higher accuracy within three weeks.
Through team-based project implementation, learners apply job-related English communication skills to real-life scenarios.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
